newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin closes unchanged at 14.97 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin closes unchanged at 14.97 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price closed unchanged at 14.97 ringgit ($6.01) a kg, stll below the key support level of 15 ringgit, when buyers and sellers matched positions after overnight gains on the London Metal Exchange.
"The price is steady but I think the market may be seeking a lower (support) level," said a trader.
The current price is the lowest in 14 months and traders were largely unable to explain the fall.
Turnover fell to 106 tonnes from 128 on Tuesday. The local premium over LME narrowed to $20 a tonne from $30. Buyers were Europeans and locals. - ($1=2.4920 ringgit)
